meanings.sent1: The baby took a crawly journey across the living room floor.
meanings.sent2: The crawly toddler explored the park on all fours.
meanings.sent3: Seeing the dog attempt a crawly dance made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The crawly movements of the caterpillar were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The crawly crab scuttled along the sandy beach.

meanings.definition: Causing a sensation like insects crawling on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The slimy texture of the mud was so crawly, it gave me goosebumps.
meanings.sent2: The spooky haunted house had a crawly atmosphere that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent3: The crawly feeling of the spider crawling up my arm made me jump.
meanings.sent4: The suspense in the air was so crawly, it felt like a thriller movie.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the forest was filled with a crawly anticipation.
